title: Make all header text red

requirements.text: Update the global header so that all visible header typography and iconography renders in red, including: the HOOD wordmark, desktop navigation link labels, the “Book Test Drive” CTA label, the mobile menu trigger icon, and the mobile sheet menu wordmark + nav links.

quotes: write all the header with red

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop, the HOOD wordmark and all nav link labels render in red in the sticky header.
The “Book Test Drive” CTA label renders in red (not black/white) and remains readable against its background.
On mobile, the hamburger/menu trigger icon renders in red.
In the mobile sheet menu, the HOOD wordmark and all nav link labels render in red.
Header navigation/scroll behavior and the mobile sheet open/close behavior continue to work as before.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui must not be edited directly; compose existing components instead.
Keep the existing header navigation structure and scroll-to-section behavior intact (no route changes).
nonGoals: Do not change the site-wide theme tokens or the color palette outside of the header.
Do not add new pages, sections, or backend functionality.
